lines.text: Great, just great. I've been outside for two minutes and I'm covered in POO...
Squished, or might get squished. Not much of a choice then, is there?

[Repeated Line]
I don't like milk.

[Repeated Line]
A Borrower is quiet, conscientious, and inconspicuous. We don't steal; we borrow.
We may be small but heaven help anyone who thinks he might squish us.
We're not vermin. We're not creeps. And we're not pests. We're Borrowers.
Well, I've had reports that an Ice Cream Vendor...
Pest Control Operative.
Oh, sorry.
That's all right, happens all the time.
A Pest Control Operative...
[looks at Jeff]
...and a rather large man...
[eyes Ocious P. Potter for a moment]
Well, that could be you, couldn't it, sir? Were seen arguing outside this house.
[Potter is about to drop Spiller into the machine]
Any last words?
Good luck with the face, FATSO!

[hears a vacuum cleaner]
What in the world...?
It's not Thursday, is it?
Oh, my goodness. They must've changed the schedule. They can't change the schedule! Can they?

[as the vacuum cleaner trembles their home]
EMERGENCY STATIONS, EVERYONE!
[the vacuum sucks up Peagreen by the floorboards until the vacuum moves away releasing Peagreen and causing a huge mess in the house]
What! Honestly, Pod!
What? Oh, I suppose this is all my fault, too!
Quick. Where's town planning I need to register a demolition.
What's the magic word?
Listen, I'm in a hurry. I got a house to demolish.
I'm waiting.

[impatiently]
So am I. Where is it?
Up the stairs, take a right at the top.
[Potter leaves]

[stops him]
Straight on through the door, climb four flights. I imagine at this point, you'll have a catch your breath. Scuttle up two more flights, bear left, and turn right at Sewage. You will then see a door in front of you. Do not go through the door, instead go through the door on your right. And you will see a fire escape in front of you. Adjacent to the fire escape is the staircase. Go up the staircase three flights. Down the hall, turn right at Construction. Look out for Demolition. You can miss it.

[confused]
Is there a faster way?

[sarcastically enunciates]
Walk... quickly.
[Arrietty observes Peagreen in dog dung on the road and laughs]

[sarcastically]
Oh, ha-ha-ha!
Did I ever tell you about the time my friend Minty got stuck in the honeypot?

[smiles]
Yes, you did.
[last lines]

[after Potter's arrest]
Little people, were they?
Yes, that's what I've been trying to tell you. They're everywhere. They're very good at climbing.
Hmm. So, what? I suppose they have little houses, do they? With little tables, little chairs?
Yes, they do.
Hmm.
[Steady laughs at this as do the whole station]

[after taking the will from Potter]
Come on, squirt, we've got to hurry!
What for, idiot? We'll never get out of here without him seeing us.
Look, we'll get out when the bean is on his lunch hour. It's always the safest time with beans.
I still think we should wait here for mum and dad.
there won't BE a here unless we give this will to Pete, before that nasty, cheating, thieving, evil, mean, greedy, vicious, ugly bean destroys our house.
Ugly? Who are they calling ugly?
[Potter takes his hammer and rips out a floorboard]

[in terror]
Arrietty, we've been seen!

[look at the objects by the floorboards]
Borrowers!
You've seen this before?
the fly with the human head, the poker-playing rats, the giant radioactive cockroaches.
Spare me the folklore, will you? Can you kill them or not?
Yes. Extermination is my middle name. But why do you want me to exterminate the Borrowers?
Because those little rats stole something very important from me. AND NOBODY STEALS FROM OCIOUS P. POTTER!
You mean borrowed, don't you?
What?
Oh, well, they're Borrowers. They don't steal, they...
[Potter gives him a disapproved look]

[goes serious]
Right!
Well, what are you waiting for?

[amazed]
Incredible! Amazing! Tiny little people, moving on the landing!

[impatiently]
WOULD YOU PLEASE GET UP HERE AND DO SOMETHING TO HELP ME!

[Introducing His Dog who is used for sniffing out Pests]
Say Hello to Smelly... I suspect You wonder how He got His Name.
Well, I wasn't actually...
[the Dog passes gas]
Whoa, that's awful, what do You feed that thing?
I feed Him on cheese!
